cause.description:
Indiana Horse Rescue is the Equine Division of Animal Protection Coalition, Inc. IHR/APC is a 501 (c)3 non profit dedicated to animal welfare.
1. All horses deserve a second chance to find a loving home.
2. The slaughtering of horses is wrong and should be stopped.
3. Education is key in preventing the abuse, neglect, and slaughter of horses in the future.
cause.mission: To prevent the needless abuse, neglect, and/or slaughter of horses.
cause.name: Indiana Horse Rescue
